abstracts.cdata!:
This Financial Sector Adjustment Loan is
            another building block of the Bank's support for the
            Government's ambitious structural adjustment program,
            and will assist in : (i) reducing the role of the state in
            the financial sector, (ii) strengthening the banking sector
            and its supervisory framework, and (iii) providing resources
            for Argentina's debt and debt service reduction
            arrangements. The major benefits of the financial sector
            reform include: (1) a more competitive private banking
            system which is expected to improve resource mobilization
            and to increase the efficiency of resource allocation, and
            (2) fiscal and quasi-fiscal savings as a result of the
            reduced role of public banks, including the Central Bank.
